article: When I was twenty-eight, I left my hometown and went to another city. There I found my first  _  . I worked  _  a dentist in a hospital.. It was cloudy yesterday .When I was  _  to go home ,it started to rain. Then I found I  _  to take my umbrella. So I ran to the  bus stop  quickly. When I reached there, , my clothes were all  _  . It got colder and colder. I  _  for about half an hour, but there weren't any buses coming. Just then a car  _  behind me. The woman in the car rolled down the window and asked if I  _  a ride. I remembered my mother told  _  not to take rides from strangers . So I said , "No, thanks."  _  she still asked me to get into her car . I looked at her  _  and she looked like a kind woman . So I  _  in and she took me all the way to my house . I thanked her and wanted to  _  her some money . She refused and went off before I  _  ask for her name . I was really lucky to meet such a kind woman in the strange city.
